content:
The survey at the end says

Once the survey is completed, we will analyze the results and post aggregated and anonymized summary to https://blog.rust-lang.org. In the meantime, you can see last year's survey results at:

https://blog.rust-lang.org/2018/11/27/Rust-survey-2018.html.

I think it means to link to: https://blog.rust-lang.org/2020/04/17/Rust-survey-2019.html

Benjamin Brittain said:

The survey at the end says

Once the survey is completed, we will analyze the results and post aggregated and anonymized summary to https://blog.rust-lang.org. In the meantime, you can see last year's survey results at:

https://blog.rust-lang.org/2018/11/27/Rust-survey-2018.html.

I think it means to link to: https://blog.rust-lang.org/2020/04/17/Rust-survey-2019.html

I can't find this link in the Forms edition UI, where is it located? Has it been fixed already?
Since the forms are live I took the liberty of updating every form, I hope that's okay

I posted this in the update questions topic but I think this one is more appropriate:

The end text links to https://community.rs which appears to be either a broken link or down. I'm actually not familiar with this resource, I don't know if it's defunct, or whether it should be removed from the end text.
